title: Hi I’m Janosch Menke
text: I am a postdoctoral Researcher at the Data Sciience & AI Division at the Chalmers University of Technology. My research interest lay in the application of AI in the field of drug discovery and currenlty I focuses on improving de novo drug design by including the human in the Reinforcement loop.

title: About Me
text:
ExperienceEducationSkills


Postdoccotral Researcher (March 2023 – Current)
Chalmers University of Technology, Sweden
Together with AstraZeneca imrpoving their de novo agent ‘Reinvent’ by integrating human feedback and preference Supervisor: Prof. Dr. Ola Engkvist
Visiting Researcher (January 2022 - July 2022)
AstraZeneca, Sweden
Built a transformer model that generates molecular representation better suited for the screening of potential ion channel modulators. Supervisor: Dr Christian Tyrchan
Ph.D. Student (October 2019 - February 2023)
University of Münster, Germany
Using Feed-forwards and Graph Neural Networks generate improvied molecular representations that improve the results of similarity searches. Supervisor: Prof. Dr. Oliver Koch
Master Student (September 2018 - June - 2019)
Sanquin, Netherlands
Improve the boostering schedule for Tetanus Antibody Donors using Bayesian Modeling.


M.Sc. Methedology and Statistics (2017-2019)
Utrecht University, Netherlands
B.Sc. Psychology (2014-2017)
University of Twente, Netherlands
